SEARCH
Module com.kentwentyfour.project12
Package com.kentwentyfour.project12.gameobjects.matrixmapobjects.obstacles

Class Water

java.lang.Object
com.kentwentyfour.project12.gameobjects.matrixmapobjects.obstacles.Water
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatrixMapArea, ObstacleArea
public class Water extends Object implements ObstacleArea
The Water class implements the ObstacleArea interface, representing a water obstacle area with specific coordinates, dimensions, and a color based on height.

    Constructs a Water object with the specified height.

    Constructs a Water object with the specified coordinates and dimensions.
